hints.content: Let's use the place value blocks to help us solve.

Let's put our tens and ones together.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/cc54985fbd836db8f86b12f702e80f0409074349)

 We have $7\text{ tens}$ and $9\text{ ones}$.

In all, there are $7\text{ tens}$ and $9\text{ ones}$.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/c3eae4d705a9110c8a8219f2d50ac1c1896efc43)

$7\text{ tens} + 9\text{ ones}= 79$
